metadata.name: Andrew Gonzalez

persona.name: Derrick Holmes
persona.role: Office Manager, small law firm (15 employees)
persona.goal: Upgrade internet speed and add business voice lines; schedule a sales callback
persona.context: Currently has slow internet impacting video calls; has authority to shortlist options but needs partner approval for final signature

intent.name: Explore Ethernet/Dedicated Connectivity
intent.description: A new lead asks about Ethernet or higher-reliability connectivity options for business use.
intent.goal: Capture contact and location details and schedule a specialized sales callback.
intent.initialMessage: We need something more reliable than regular broadband—do you offer business ethernet?

emotion.name: Anxious
emotion.description: Worried about downtime or deadlines; asks repeated reassurance questions about install dates, service continuity, or disruptions.

metadata.outcome: Sales consultation call scheduled and basic install timing expectations requested.

turns.content: We need something more reliable than regular broadband—do you offer business ethernet?
We do have Ethernet solutions for business customers. To get details, I’ll arrange a call with a Business Class agent. Could you share your name so I can set that up?

messages: We do have Ethernet solutions for business customers. To get details, I’ll arrange a call with a Business Class agent. Could you share your name so I can set that up?

turns.content:
Sure, it’s Derrick Holmes.  

Before you set that up, can you tell me if they’ll be able to go over both higher-speed internet and adding a few business voice lines on the same call?
I can confirm the agent can cover higher‑speed internet options and add business voice lines in the same call. What date, time, and timezone work best for you?

messages: I can confirm the agent can cover higher‑speed internet options and add business voice lines in the same call. What date, time, and timezone work best for you?

turns.content:
That’s perfect, thanks.  

Could we do this Thursday at 10:30 AM Eastern? Also, how long should I set aside for the call, and will they be able to give me at least a ballpark install timeframe so I know we’re not looking at weeks of downtime?

Our calls typically run 20‑30 minutes and the agent can give you a ballpark install window. We can’t book same‑day, so could we aim for next Thursday at 10:30 AM Eastern or another day that works? Let me know your preferred date and time.

messages: Our calls typically run 20‑30 minutes and the agent can give you a ballpark install window. We can’t book same‑day, so could we aim for next Thursday at 10:30 AM Eastern or another day that works? Let me know your preferred date and time.

turns.content:
Next Thursday at 10:30 AM Eastern works for me.  

What info do you need from me to lock that in, and will the agent be able to confirm that there’s no interruption to our current internet during install? That’s the part I’m most worried about with court deadlines.

Great, Derrick—your call is set for Thursday, January 15, 2026, at 10:30 AM Eastern. You’ll get a text with the number to dial about five minutes before. The agent will discuss higher‑speed internet, add voice lines, and give a ballpark install window to help avoid any downtime. Anything else I can help with?

messages: Great, Derrick—your call is set for Thursday, January 15, 2026, at 10:30 AM Eastern. You’ll get a text with the number to dial about five minutes before. The agent will discuss higher‑speed internet, add voice lines, and give a ballpark install window to help avoid any downtime. Anything else I can help with?

turns.content:
Thanks, that helps. Just to double‑check, if we decide to move forward after that call, are we talking days or more like several weeks before install usually happens for small offices?

That’s all I need for now.
